import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Style.css'; const Update = () => { const [employee, setEmployee] = useState({ Ename: '', Eid: '', Edept: '', Edob: '', Egender: [], Edesign: '', Esalary: '', Eaddress: '', Elocation: '', Epincode: '', Eexperience: '', Eage: '' }); const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:8081/update/${id}`) .then(response => { const data = response.data; setEmployee(data); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }, [id]); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, checked } = e.target; if (name === 'Egender') { if (checked) { setEmployee(prevState => ({ ...prevState, Egender: [...prevState.Egender, value] })); } else { setEmployee(prevState => ({ ...prevState, Egender: prevState.Egender.filter(item => item !== value) })); } } else { setEmployee(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); } }; const handleUpdate = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.put(`http://localhost:8081/update/${id}`, employee) .then(res => { navigate('/'); }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }; return (
